FAQPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions ‚ùì
FAQPage.intro: Everything you need to know about AfroBirthday. Can't find the answer you're looking for?

still.title: Still have questions?
still.subtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us anytime.

items.question: How long does it take to receive my video?
items.answer: Your personalized birthday video will be delivered within 24-48 hours from order confirmation. With our Express option (+‚Ç¨5.99), you can receive it in just 12-24 hours!

items.question: What if I don't like the video?
items.answer: We offer a 100% money-back guarantee within 7 days. If you're not completely satisfied with your video, simply email us at support@afrobirthday.com with your order ID, and we'll process a full refund - no questions asked!

items.question: Can I request a specific style or costume?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can add any special requests in the custom message field of our order form. Our team will do their best to accommodate your wishes.

items.question: What if the text is wrong in the video?
items.answer: We double-check all text before filming. However, if there's an error on our part, we'll remake the video for free within 24 hours.

items.question: Is my photo safe?
items.answer: Yes! Your photo is encrypted during upload and stored securely. We delete all personal photos from our servers within 30 days after video delivery. We never share your data with third parties.

items.question: Can I download the video?
items.answer: Yes! You'll receive a direct download link via email. The video is yours to keep forever and share however you like - on WhatsApp, social media, or save it for memories.

items.question: What if I want multiple videos?
items.answer: You can order as many videos as you need! Simply complete the order form multiple times. For bulk orders (5+ videos), contact us at support@afrobirthday.com for special pricing.

items.question: Can I use this for corporate events?
items.answer: Absolutely! Many companies use our videos for employee birthdays and celebrations. Email support@afrobirthday.com for custom corporate pricing and branding options.

items.question: Is the video watermarked?
items.answer: By default, videos include a small, tasteful AfroBirthday logo. If you prefer no watermark, just mention it in your order notes - we're happy to accommodate!

items.question: What music options are available?
items.answer: You can either let us choose the perfect birthday music (included in base price) or provide your own song choice for an additional ‚Ç¨8.56. You can upload an MP3 file or share a YouTube/Spotify link.

items.question: Can I gift this to someone?
items.answer: Yes! During checkout, you can enter the recipient's email address, and we'll send the video directly to them. You can also add a personalized gift message.

items.question: Do you ship physical DVDs?
items.answer: Not currently - all our videos are delivered digitally for the fastest possible delivery. However, if you're interested in physical copies, let us know at support@afrobirthday.com!

who.title: Who We Are
who.p1: AfroBirthday is a celebration platform that connects people around the world with authentic African joy and energy. We create personalized birthday video messages performed by talented African dancers who bring genuine happiness to every celebration.
who.p2: Founded with a mission to spread joy globally while supporting African artists, we've delivered over 500 personalized videos to customers in more than 50 countries.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe every birthday deserves a moment of pure joy. Our mission is to create unforgettable birthday experiences that connect cultures, spread happiness, and support talented creators in Africa.

team.title: Our Team
team.p1: Our team consists of passionate dancers, choreographers, and video creators based in Kenya and across Africa. Every team member brings their unique energy and cultural authenticity to each video we create.
